basic.description: Wave description of matter. Schrodinger equation, angular momentum, tunneling. Application to atomic structure, spectra, the electron gas and quantum systems. (4/28/0/4/0)~ COURSE DELETED IN 2008/09 ~

basic.title: Wave Mechanics
